cookie.title: Cookie Policy and Privacy Notice
cookie.description: We use cookies to provide you with the best experience on our website. For detailed information about the processing of your personal data, please review our Privacy Policy and Clarification Text.

noResults.title: No Journeys Found
noResults.description: No journeys found matching your criteria. Please try a different date or route.

journey.footer: Prices and availability may vary. Check your selected journey for current information.

privacy.intro: This privacy policy explains how your personal data is collected, used, and protected.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: When using our services, we collect some information to provide you with a better experience. This includes IP address, browser information, and usage data.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content: The data we collect is used to improve our service quality, enhance user experience, and ensure security.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: Your data security is important to us. We protect your information using industry-standard security measures.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to improve your experience. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about our privacy policy, please contact us.

errors.sameLocation: Departure and arrival cannot be the same!
errors.pastDate: You cannot select a past date!
errors.sessionError: Session could not be started. Please refresh the page.
errors.loadError: An error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.locationLoadError: City list could not be loaded.
